alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms over Fruitland, or near Salt Springs, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Springs, Fruitland, Welaka and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
